channel.title: CVE Feed for NVIDIA -- NVIDIA ConnectX Firmware
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NVIDIA -- NVIDIA ConnectX Firmware

item.title: CVE-2023-0205|2023-04-22T02:26:35.234Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20connectx%20firmware
item.description: NVIDIA ConnectX-5, ConnectX-6, and ConnectX6-DX contain a vulnerability in the NIC firmware, where an unprivileged user can exploit insufficient granularity of access control, which may lead to denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2023-0204|2023-04-22T02:24:54.842Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20connectx%20firmware
item.description: NVIDIA ConnectX-5, ConnectX-6, and ConnectX6-DX contain a vulnerability in the NIC firmware, where an unprivileged user can cause improper handling of exceptional conditions, which may lead to denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2023-0203|2023-04-22T02:24:15.822Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20connectx%20firmware
item.description: NVIDIA ConnectX-5, ConnectX-6, and ConnectX6-DX contain a vulnerability in the NIC firmware, where an unprivileged user can exploit insufficient granularity of access control, which may lead to denial of service.
